description: Number of key permutations of length n: permutations {a_i} with |a_i-a_{i-1}|=1 or 2.
references: S. Avgustinovich and S. Kitaev, On uniquely k-determined permutations, Discr. Math., 308 (2008), 1500-1507.
E. S. Page, Systematic generation of ordered sequences using recurrence relations, Computer J., 14 (1971), 150-153.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: R. H. Hardin, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..251, May 06 2010
Simon Plouffe, Approximations de séries génératrices et quelques conjectures, Dissertation, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
Simon Plouffe, 1031 Generating Functions and Conjectures, Université du Québec à Montréal, 1992.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Better description and g.f. from _Erich Friedman_.
